alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Concordia, southwestern Catahoula Parishes in northeastern Louisiana and southwestern Adams Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mayna, or 13 miles south of Jonesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Era around 435 PM CDT. Acme around 440 PM CDT. Monterey around 445 PM CDT. Slocum and Deer Park around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi.
